original_title: まさか！エロ配信が担任の先生にバレちゃうなんて！！松本いちか
overview: I am a serious honor student at school. But actually, I have a hobby that I can't tell everyone. It's a naughty live delivery! It's also a pocket money earner, and if you deliver it little by little, everyone will be happy to say that you're a god, and you'll think, "I want to do more!" But no way, I couldn't get caught by an acquaintance who shouldn't get caught ...
title: No Way! My Teacher Found Out About My Livecam!! Ichika Matsumoto
